pages.title: Creating Budding Onyx
pages.text: Crafting onyx was always very nerdy, as it depended on the current phase of the moon, despite the $(l:magical_items/crescent_clock)Crescent Clock$(/l).$(br)By making Onyx farmable like the other gems, will save you a huge amount of time.$(br2)$(italic)Strangely, the same procedure does not seem to work for other colored gems?

pages.title: Spirit Inst. Recipe
pages.text: Even if it seems expensive, having renewable onyx seems worth it.$(br)Better to craft a larger amount of these $(l:general/midnight_aberration)Midnight Aberrations$(/l) all at once, as they seem to crumble in your hands quickly.
